name: Voyageur (itch) (Phinmala)
description:
VOYAGEUR

Hey! I’m a representative for the Asian Sensation and judging by your t-shirt you seem to be a gamer and history buff! Have you heard about the Asian Sensation’s new release? It’s called Voyageur and it is a historical game following the journey of the French Canadian fur trappers. The goal of the game is to transport fur pelts to the trading post at Lake Superior. Along the way you have to face challenges such as paddling and fighting red squirrels. Plus, the unique paint style catches eyes and makes the gameplay seem like it’s straight out of a painting. Check out Voyageur by the Asian Sensation if you’re looking for a historic game with a unique style.
